english.segment1: Give me one reason to trust you. Give me one reason to try. Even beauty gets broken, Sometimes, sometimes
english.segment2: No regrets, no mistakes. Take another look between the lines. Where color fades from gray
english.segment3: Don't look back, don't be afraid. Cause every little thing between the lines. Got us here today
english.segment4: Now that it's all in the open. Now that it's all on the line. Show me your strength in your weakness. And I will show you mine
english.segment5: With no regrets, no mistakes. Take another look between the lines. Where color fades from gray
english.segment6: Don't look back, don't be afraid. It's every little thing between the lines. That got us here today
english.segment7: I know you never really meant to hurt me. I know you never meant to make me cry. Sorry that I can't be stronger
english.segment8: No regrets, no mistakes. Take another look between these lines. Where color fades from gray
english.segment9: Don't look back, don't be afraid. Take another look between the lines. Got us here today
english.segment10: No regrets, no mistakes. Take another look between the lines. Where color fades from gray
english.segment11: Don't look back, don't be afraid. Cause every little thing between the lines. Got us here today
